name: Prakash Ahuja
bio: Prakash Ahuja is one of the pioneers in the electrical field with over three decades of experience as an entrepreneur. He has a reputation for being a visionary and business is a passion for him.

name: Ibrahim Somji
bio: Ibrahim Somji has been a first generation entrepreneur in the field of electrical products and a leading builder, having built certain very prestigious towers. He is known among the business community as an astute and straight forward man.

name: Sonu S Thakur
bio: Sonu S Thakur is a Chartered Accountant, Company Secretary and Certified Public accountant. He comes with more than two and half decades of experience. He had worked as Chief Financial Officer with Multinational companies and joined as CEO for Dallas Group in January 2015.

name: Amjad Ali
bio: Amjad Ali is a qualified Electrical engineer, and has been with Dallas since last twenty two years. Dallas customers call him a articulate engineer, as the technical suggestions imparted by him has benefited cost savings, and provided efficient and effective solutions.

name: Haresh Lalwani
bio: Haresh Lalwani is a graduate in accounts & law, and has been with Dallas since last twenty two years. Haresh has great business acumen and maintains fantastic relationship with both customers and suppliers through his upright approach.

name: Vijay Ahuja
bio: Haresh Lalwani is a graduate in accounts & law, and has been with Dallas since last twenty two years. Haresh has great business acumen and maintains fantastic relationship with both customers and suppliers through his upright approach.

name: Muralidharan VK
bio: Muralidharan is in charge of exports and developing new product lines in other countries.

name: Anita Singh
bio: Anita is a finance professional, and is with Dallas for last ten years.
